pr_title: Fix DS64 configuration tool ability to perform factory reset

timeline.message: fix LocoNet DS64 factory reset function
remove improper addition with wrong translation

Ds64.properties

Use resource key that doesn't require changes to _nl.properties

timeline.bodyText: If a button with the text Stop is desired, I suggest that the bundle is ButtonStop. Buttons with the word Cancel is heavily used in software, so I think it's bad to use ButtonCancel for anything else than Cancel.
timeline.author: danielb987
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -135,3 +137,6 @@ StatusWriting = write SV{0} (port {1} V{2})
 StatusWriteMode = write SV{0} (port {1} mode)
 AddressToolTip = Enter LocoIO Module Low Address (hex 01-7f, excluding 0x50 = dec 80)
 SubAddressToolTip = Enter LocoIO Module High Address (hex 01-7f = dec 1-126)
+
+# Used by several different LocoNet-based tools
+ButtonCancel = Stop

replies.bodyText: Changed it to get the "inherited" ButtonCancel value, which somehow works just fine right now (it failed last nite!)
replies.author: devel-bobm

timeline.message: allow GUI operations on 'OpSw Values' tab to affect values written to DS64 device
